node.title: Firework
node.excerpt: Allows you to write complex logic by combining commands with molang!

node.title: Custom Entity Syntax
node.excerpt: Adds support for custom entity syntax such as adding component groups or spell effects directly in events.

node.title: Switchable Block Visuals
node.excerpt: Adds a component that allows for switching between multiple block geometries & textures simultaneously.

node.title: More Vanilla Entity Presets
node.excerpt: Adds a cod, salmon and bat preset.

node.title: Lush Theme
node.excerpt: Adds a new lush cave-inspired color theme to select inside the settings window.

node.title: Custom Fence Gate Preset
node.excerpt: Adds a Custom Fence Gate Preset(This plugin only works in the latest beta!)

node.title: Texture Set Generator
node.excerpt: Easily generate, customize and save .texture_set.json files

node.title: Compact Prettier
node.excerpt: Compactly prettifies your JSON code upon saving
